mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item ( seller_id, description, price, image_url, created_at, title, additional_images ) VALUES ( #{sellerId}, #{description}, #{price}, #{imageUrl}, #{createdAt}, #{title}, #{additionalImages} )
mapper.select: SELECT i.item_id, i.seller_id, i.description, i.price, i.image_url, i.created_at, i.title, i.additional_images, u.login_email as seller_email, u.name as seller_name FROM item i LEFT JOIN user u ON i.seller_id = u.id WHERE i.item_id = #{itemId}

SELECT i.item_id, i.seller_id, i.description, i.price, i.image_url, i.created_at, i.title, i.additional_images, u.login_email as seller_email, u.name as seller_name FROM item i LEFT JOIN user u ON i.seller_id = u.id ORDER BY i.item_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET description = #{description}, price = #{price}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, title = #{title}, additional_images = #{additionalImages} WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
